name: Christ's Command to St. Peter, "Feed My Sheep!" ("Pasce Oves Mea")
description: Christ's Command to St. Peter, "Feed My Sheep!" ("Pasce Oves Mea"); Andrea Sacchi (Italian, 1599 - 1661); about 1628; Red chalk and red wash; 25.4 x 17.9 cm (10 x 7 1/16 in.); 95.GB.42; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Christ's Command to St. Peter, "Feed My Sheep!" ("Pasce Oves Mea")
